scripts.reset: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:dev: sequelize-cli db:drop && sequelize-cli db:create && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:test: sequelize-cli --env=test db:drop && sequelize-cli --env=test db:create && sequelize-cli --env=test db:migrate
scripts.db:pro: sequelize-cli --env=production db:drop && sequelize-cli --env=production db:create && sequelize-cli --env=production db:migrate && sequelize-cli --env=production db:seed:all
